meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>foundation</kanji> <kanji>tray</kanji> is a flat thing that is your foundation. It holds everything up. It is the <vocabulary>base</vocabulary> of everything that goes above it. It is the <vocabulary>foundation</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
